title: Kinjirareta Alpha No Ko Chikai No Hachimitsu Madeleine - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   School Life   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Complex Family Relationships   Cute Children   Different Social Status   Fated Lovers   Mpreg   Omegaverse
author: Erena Katou   華藤えれな
description:
It doesn't have to be fate, I just want you...only you!

Keith appears before Yuan and asks for his hand...

Yuan, a student from an elite omega academy, secretly adores Keith, a noble alpha who understands his desire to live freely. One night when his estrus comes, Keith and Yuan are destined to be together as a pair of fates. But because of that rule-breaking incident, Yuan became a target for those around him. In order to protect the man he loves, Yuan silently disappears.

Four years later, Keith finds out that Yuan has been secretly raising a child. Keith had no idea that he was the father of the child. This made Keith obsessed with Yuan, and mistakenly believed that Yuan had betrayed him.>
